meanings.sent1: The submitters handed in their homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The submitters signed the petition to support the cause.
meanings.sent3: The submitters joked about submitting their lunch order to the principal.
meanings.sent4: The submitters were like diligent messengers, delivering their messages promptly.
meanings.sent5: The submitters were like diligent messengers, delivering their messages promptly.

meanings.definition: A group of people who submit something.
meanings.sent1: The submitters gathered to present their findings at the conference.
meanings.sent2: The submitters collaborated to complete the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The submitters planned a surprise submission party for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The submitters were a united force, submitting their ideas for consideration.
meanings.sent5: The submitters were a united force, submitting their ideas for consideration.
